article_title: Deadliest year for Palestinians killed in the West Bank - UN refugee agency.
sentence: The  UN  Palestinian  refugee  agency  (Unrwa)  says  that  at  least  288  people  in  its  Gaza  shelters  have  been  killed  since  Hamas's  attack  on  7  October,  in  a  post  on  X  .

article_title: Deadliest year for Palestinians killed in the West Bank - UN refugee agency.
sentence: It  added  that  271  Palestinians  -  including  69  children  -  have  been  killed  by  Israeli  forces  in  the  West  Bank.

article_title: Deadliest year for Palestinians killed in the West Bank - UN refugee agency.
sentence: This,  it  says,  marks  the  "deadliest  year  for  Palestinians  killed  in  the  West  Bank"  since  the  UN  started  recording  casualties.
